meta.title: TaxClass - Models - Tax Provider API - Provider APIs - API Reference

code.description: The provider-specific tax code for this item. Items can be classified with tax codes relevant to each Tax Provider, configured by the merchant, and assigned to their products within BigCommerce. A tax code is intended to apply to multiple products. This code should match the tax codes provided by the third-party integration.

class_id.description: The ID of the tax class defined in the merchant’s BigCommerce store. May have a UUID value.

name.description: The human-readable name of this tax class in the merchant’s BigCommerce store.
